PreceptDef.label: monastic
PreceptDef.description:
A communal living space allows us to meditate and contemplate the meaning of this life together. Private rooms are an unnecessary frivolity.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Colonists receive positive mood by sleeping in barracks, but the room should be above Awful and below Extremely impressive.
 - Colonists receive negative mood by sleeping in a private room.

PreceptDef.label: preferred
PreceptDef.description:
Sharing a bedroom bring a certain sensation of security in the Rim. Who would want to sleep alone in such a terrible world?

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Colonists receive small positive mood boosts by sleeping in barracks.
 - Colonists receive negative mood by sleeping in a private room.
